thread.title: 35 Long Hairstyles with Bangs - Best Celebrity Long Hair with Bangs Styles
thread.title_full: 35 Long Hairstyles with Bangs - Best Celebrity Long Hair with Bangs Styles

author: The Editors
title: 35 Long Hairstyles with Bangs - Best Celebrity Long Hair with Bangs Styles
text:
1 Of 36 Mischa Barton 
Aughties icon Mischa Barton's signature look was eye-level bangs that were thinned out—so they didn't take over her face—and sunny California girl highlights. Getty 2 Of 36 Halle Berry 
This scrunchy, beach babe look needs to be on your warm-weather Pinterest board. The tousled bangs give it a cool girl edge and the intentionally un-perfect waves are the ideal rolled-out-of-bed style for lazy girls. Sea salt spray + a braid (or some loose tousling with a curling iron) is all you need. Getty 3 Of 36 Dakota Johnson 
A simplistic way to ramp up your ponytail: brush it back and gently feather your bangs out like Johnson's. Getty 4 Of 36 Anna Faris 
One of our favorite beauty moments from Anna Faris was this milky blonde hair moment with rounded, blunt-edged bangs. Getty 5 Of 36 Alexa Chung 
No one does the "trying but not trying" bedhead quite like Alexa Chung. Pro tip: part your hair slightly off-center to achieve the same face framing (but not too studied) effect. Getty
